name: Labelbox proxy
description: A proxy service for generating presigned urls

SECRET.description: A JWT secret used to generate your signed urls

AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID.description: Access key for your AWS S3 bucket.

AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.description: Secret access key for your AWS S3 bucket.

AWS_DEFAULT_REGION.description: AWS region where your bucket is located. Default: us-east-1
